ingredients: 1  mango - peeled, seeded and diced, 1  papaya - peeled, seeded and diced, 1 large red bell pepper, seeded and diced, 1  avocado - peeled, pitted and diced,   +   1/2  sweet onion, peeled and diced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar,   salt and pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 1g 3%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 11g 4%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 49mg 245%, Calcium 15mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 274mg 6%
